title: [Build cop] SDFormat 4 and 5 memory leak test fail on Windows

content.raw:
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopTests/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat4-windows7-amd64/39/testReport/junit/(root)/ElementMemoryLeak/SDFCreateDestroy/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopTests/job/sdformat-ci-sdformat5-windows7-amd64/17/testReport/junit/(root)/ElementMemoryLeak/SDFCreateDestroy/

~~~
39: [ RUN      ] ElementMemoryLeak.SDFCreateDestroy
39:   File "D:/Jenkins/workspace/sdformat-ci-sdformat4-windows7-amd64/workspace/sdformat/tools/get_mem_info.py", line 12
39:     print memory_info[0]
39:                     ^
39: SyntaxError: invalid syntax
39: unknown file: error: C++ exception with description "invalid stoi argument" thrown in the test body.
39: [  FAILED  ] ElementMemoryLeak.SDFCreateDestroy (31 ms)
~~~
